Description: Disables automatic server restarts to avoid conflicts with AMP
Sets the [auth token](https://alderongames.com/oauth/hosting-token) to install and run the server. The associated account must have access to the game
Sets the required GUID for the server. Must be in UUIDv4 format. Default is a random GUID
Sets the public name of the server. To include spaces in the name displayed in the server list, you MUST use underscores to represent those spaces

Sets the server rules displayed and that must be accepted when players first join the server. Refer to these [formatting instructions](https://github.com/Alderon-Games/pot-community-servers/wiki/Setting-up-Rules#formatting)
DefaultValue:
<title>Server Rules</>
<red>1 - Please only attack Camptos.</>
Camptosauruses are very evil!

<orange>2 - Corpse Cove is closed due to dirty water.</>

These are the only rules on this server!
<large>Thanks, and have fun!</>

Description: Sets the welcome message displayed when players join the server. Refer to these [formatting instructions](https://github.com/Alderon-Games/pot-community-servers/wiki/Setting-up-Message-of-the-Day-(MOTD%29#formatting)
DefaultValue:
<title>Welcome to Path of Titans Server - powered by AMP!</>
<large>Have fun!</>

Description: Sets the password to connect to the server
See the Security and Privacy menu for configurable options for the server's RCON
If set, enables BattlEye Anti-Cheat
Sets the map for the server. If using a modded map, select Custom and set the "Custom Map Name"

Sets a custom map for the server. Custom type must be selected under "Server Map". GameUserSettings.ini also needs to be configured. Refer to these [instructions](https://github.com/Alderon-Games/pot-community-servers/wiki/Setting-up-Mods)
If set, enables the full map for the entire server
If set, enables the minimap for the entire server

If required, you can change the binding of the server and Source RCON by editing App.ApplicationIPBinding in GenericModule.kvp for the instance. Stop the instance (not just the server) first. AMP itself must be able to reach the set IP, otherwise it will not be able to connect to RCON
If needed, sets the IPv4 address of the server shown on the public server list. Useful for players to connect via a different IP, such as through a relay or via DDoS protection
Sets the maximum number of players that may connect to the server at one time. Actual number allowed may be higher as a result of reserved slots for admins (default 20)
Sets the number of reserved slots for admin players, above the player limit

Server admins can be specified in Game.ini by their Alderon Games IDs. Format is "ServerAdmins=123-456-789" (don't include quotes) in the [/Script/PathOfTitans.IGameSession] section. Add the section heading if needed. One admin per line
Sets the maximum number of slots allowed for player groups
If enabled, free-to-play users will not be able to join the server
Sets the amount of time before a player will be automatically disconnected from the server if they are idle/AFK. 0 = idle player kick disabled
Sets the maximum client ping time before auto-disconnecting a player from the server. 0 = disabled
Sets the period that a player's ping time must be above the Maximum Client Ping Time before being disconnected
Sets the amount of time required to be on the logout menu before a player safe logs. 0 = instant logout
If set, enables text chat for the entire server
If set, enables the global chat channel on the server
Sets whether to use a local or remote database. Local is recommended unless connecting shared character data between servers is required

Sets which beta branch to install. "Production" is recommended. Use ["Public Test"](https://alderongames.com/public-test-branch-desktop) at your own risk. NOTE: Update the server after switching branches!
Sets the connected community Discord server. Include only the letters/numbers after the discord.gg part of the server invite link
If set, enables RCON logging
Sets the limit on failed RCON login attempts
Sets the maximum time for an RCON login to succeed
Sets the maximum connections to RCON per IP
Sets the in-game time of day the server begins at after a restart. Examples: 100 = 1:00 AM, 1200 = 12:00 PM, and 1800 = 6:00 PM
Sets whether the server uses a fixed or dynamic time of day
Sets the length of a full day cycle
If set, enables fish spawning

If desired, all dinosaurs except certain listed dinosaurs can be disabled on the server, by including relevant entries in Game.ini. As per [these instructions](https://github.com/Alderon-Games/pot-community-servers/wiki/Enabling-and-Disabling-Dinosaurs), format is "AllowedCharacters=DinosaurName" (don't include quotes or + at the beginning) in the [/Script/PathOfTitans.IGameSession] section. Add the section heading if needed. One dinosaur per line
If set, enables the water quality system
If set, enables overriding water regeneration. If disabled, the server will use the default values
If enabled, water will naturally regenerate over time. If disabled, you must ensure water restoration quests are on the servermap, otherwise water will eventually run out
Sets the water regeneration rate multiplier update
Sets the amount of time before water applies a regeneration amount. Setting this value too low makes the server update water more frequently and can cause lag
Sets the amount of water regenerated every cycle. This scales depending on how large the body of water is
Sets a multiplier that increases the amount of water restored when it rains
If set, enables players to spend marks to insta-cooldown Waystones
Sets the duration of the cooldown timer for Waystones. -1 will use the default cooldown timer
Sets how many quests must be completed within a POI before it is "completed"
If set, enables fall damage for all users on the server
Sets how long a dead body will persist in the server. 0 = persists forever
If set, enables home caves on the server

DisplayName: Allow Ability Editing In Home Caves Only
Description: If set, players can only edit abilities in their home caves. If disabled, players can edit their abilities anywhere so long as they are sleeping. Recommended to be enabled if Home Caves are enabled

If set, enables the tutorial Hatchling Caves. Players will spawn in a tutorial area at 0 growth, and completing quests will bring them to 0.3 growth by the time they exit. If disabled, players will spawn in the world at 0.3 growth and completely skip the tutorial
If set, enables hunger and thirst in caves. If disabled, dinosaurs will not lose hunger or thirst in caves and will take no damage if they have no food or water
If set, enables growth on the server. If disabled, all dinosaurs will spawn as adults, and all existing characters will be bumped up to adult

Adds additional passive growth to all dinosaurs equally. Full growth = 1 so a good value for this might be 0.005, which means a player would take 200 minutes (3.3 hours) to reach adulthood. 0 = passive growth disabled
Allows the rate of growth earned by players when they complete quests to be adjusted. 0 = growth from quests disabled
Sets the multiplier used when rewarding marks for quest completion
If set, allows the time it takes for a local quest to cooldown after completion to be overridden
Sets the time it takes for a quest to cooldown before it can be completed again

DisplayName: Enable POI Completion Reward Timer Override
Description: If set, allows the time it takes for the POI completion reward to reset after reaching 100% to be overriden
Sets the time it takes for the POI completion reward to reset before it can be completed again
If set, rewards will be limited to the amount set under Rewards Limit
Sets the maximum amount of rewards allowed. Requires Enable Rewards Limit to be set
If enabled, unclaimed quests will be lost on death

DisplayName: Allow Item Collection Within POI Only
Description: If set, items must be collected within a POI
If set, allows players to lose growth past juvenile/adolescent/sub-adult/adult growth states when they die
Sets the percentage of total marks a player will lose when they die from combat
Sets the percentage of growth a player will lose when they die from combat
Sets the percentage of total marks a player will lose when they die from fall damage
Sets the percentage of growth a player will lose when they die from fall damage
Sets the percentage of total marks a player will lose when they die from starvation, thirst or drowning
Sets the percentage of growth a player will lose when they die from starvation, thirst or drowning

If enabled, when a player is killed, any of their other characters within a certain radius are flagged with a 10 minute timer, which prevents those specific characters from logging back in right away. Currently only works with remote databases, for hived servers
Sets the radius of the Anti-Revenge Kill Lockout distance
Sets the action taken when speed hacks are detected. A PlayerHack webhook will also be sent for the log, kick and ban actions
Sets the amount of speedhack detections that will be allowed per minute before the Speed Hack Detection Action is taken. Helps to minimise false positives due to packet loss or lag. 0 = disabled
If enabled, the server will restrict carnivore grouping to the same species
Sets the distance for players to be able to see their other group members
